typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		MTART as string,
		NORMT as string,
		GEWEI as string,
		VOLUM as decimal(10,0),
		VOLEH as string,
		RAUBE as string,
		ETIFO as string,
		EAN11 as string,
		LAENG as decimal(10,0),
		BREIT as decimal(10,0),
		HOEHE as decimal(10,0),
		MEABM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MARA
source(output(
		MATNR as string,
		SPRAS as string,
		MAKTX as string,
		MAKTG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MAKT
MAKT, MARA join(MAKT@MATNR == MARA@MATNR,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> jnrMARA
jnrMARA sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ItemSku as string,
		ItemSku1 as string,
		ItemDescription as string,
		DescriptiveLabelText as string,
		ItemTypeId as string,
		ItemDescription1 as string,
		WeightUomId as string,
		ItemVolume as decimal(20,0),
		ItemVolumeUomId as string,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId as string,
		InformationLabelText as string,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber as string,
		ItemLength as decimal(20,0),
		ItemWidth as decimal(20,0),
		ItemHeight as decimal(20,0),
		LwhUomId as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ItemSku = MARA@MATNR,
		ItemDescription = NORMT,
		InformationLabelText = ETIFO,
		DescriptiveLabelText = MAKTG,
		GlobalTradeItemNumber = EAN11,
		ItemLength = LAENG,
		ItemWidth = BREIT,
		ItemHeight = HOEHE,
		LwhUomId = MEABM,
		ItemVolume = VOLUM,
		ItemVolumeUomId = VOLEH,
		WeightUomId = GEWEI,
		StandardStorageUnitTypeId = RAUBE,
		ItemTypeId = MTART
	)) ~> Item
